Judul: Facile and Equipment-Free Data Encryption and Decryption by Self-Encrypting Pt(II) Complex
Abstrak: Luminescence switching materials are vital tovarious data security-related techniques, including dataencryption?decryption. Here, we report a family ofpseudopolymorphs based on a diimine?platinum(II) com-plex, Pt(Me3SiC?CbpyC?CSiMe3)(C?CC6H4Br-3)2(1),and systematically studied the influence of stacking modes onluminescence switching behaviors. Upon exposure to heat ortetrahydrofuran vapor, these pseudopolymorphs exhibitunusual stacking mode-intervened luminescence switching(SMILS) property that non-columnar and quasi-columnarpseudopolymorphs undergo single- and multi-step conversion processes, respectively, to the same non-columnar products.Systematic studies revealed that the unique SMILS behavior is caused by the existence of stable intermediate products as well asdifferent conversion processes of pseudopolymorphs with distinct stacking modes. Such a new property leads to the self-encryption function of1, which is very important for improving the existing data encryption?decryption technique. On thisbasis, we developed a facile, reusable, equipment-free technique with1as the only starting material and realized dataencryption?decryption successfully.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Jun Ni,Mengmeng Su,Yanqin Li,Jianjun Zhang,Huajun Zhou,Zhong-Ning Chen
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Kata Kunci: Pt(II) complex, self-encryption, stacking mode-intervened luminescence switching, data encryption?decryption,equipment-free
